title: Wedding Pet - Novel Updates
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Famous Parents   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Parent Complex   Persistent Love Interests   Poor to Rich
author: 安否安否
description:
In order to save her father, she married herself to a woman who had only seen one side. She thought that her life was over, but she never thought that one day she would be so happy because of this decision.

'Xing Qing, all you want, think, and wish, I will do it for you, because you are my wife.'
'Fang Xia, because of you, from then on I became a worldly, arrogant, petty public act!'>
